subject: SEA
description: Introduction to oceanographic research. Design a collaborative, hypothesis-driven project following the scientific process. Collect original data. Conduct analysis and interpretation, then prepare a written report and oral presentation.
catalogWhenOffered: Fall, spring, summer (not offered every year).
catalogPrereqCoreq: Corequisites required. Refer to SEA Semester program descriptions at www.sea.edu.
catalogOutcomes: Students will be able to critically analyze and interpret authentic oceanographic data.
Students will be able to generate clear visual representations of oceanographic data.
Students will be able to participate and contribute as essential members of a research team.
